com.jcabi.github

Interface Gitignores


  • @Immutable
public interface Gitignores
    Github Gitignore.

    Defines storage of .gitignore templates

    Since:
    0.8
    Version:
    $Id: bca70871088f2602c5733a77c09f203a7e180af5 $
    Author:
    Paul Polishchuk (ppol@ua.fm)
    See Also:
    Gitignore
